mapper.select: SELECT * FROM Menu WHERE name = #{_name} AND group_id = #{_groupId}
SELECT * FROM Menu WHERE name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{_name},'%') AND group_id = #{_groupId}
SELECT * FROM Menu WHERE menu_type = #{menuType} AND group_id = #{_groupId}
SELECT * FROM Daily_meal WHERE date_value = #{_date} AND group_id = #{_groupId}
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(date_value,'%Y-%m-%d') AS recentDate FROM Daily_meal WHERE menu = #{_id} AND group_id = #{_groupId} ORDER BY date_value DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT b.name AS name, a.* FROM Daily_meal AS a JOIN Menu AS b ON (a.menu = b.id) WHERE a.date_value BETWEEN #{_date} AND #{_date}+30 AND a.time = #{_time} AND a.group_id = #{_groupId} ORDER BY a.date_value ASC;
SELECT a.* FROM Ingredient AS a INNER JOIN Used_ingredient AS b ON (b.Menu_id = #{_menuId} AND b.Ingredient_id = a.id)
SELECT * FROM Menu AS a JOIN Used_ingredient AS b ON a.id = b.Menu_id WHERE b.Ingredient_id = #{_ingredientId}
SELECT * FROM SelfDish WHERE name = #{_name}, date_value = #{_date} AND group_id = #{_groupId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Daily_meal (date_value, time, group_id, menu) VALUES (#{dateValue}, #{_time}, #{_groupId}, #{_menu})
INSERT INTO Menu (name, menu_type, group_id) VALUES (#{_name}, #{_menutype}, #{_groupId})
mapper.update: UPDATE Menu SET menu_type=#{_menutype} WHERE name=#{_name}
UPDATE Daily_meal SET date_value=#{dateValue}, time=#{_time}, group_id=#{_groupId}, menu=#{_menu} WHERE date_value=#{beforeDate} AND time=#{beforeTime}
